name: Archedrum messages
description:
Analog drawing and painting, digitally reflected with further digital drawing and color manipulation. 

Some legends and stories are transmitted through language, through words. Others speak to us through rhythm, vibration, dance, beats and sounds in a language our body, subconscious and soul recognize. Drum and human share a deep primordial connection throughout civilizations – drum beat is rcognized in the depths od our being, as something so intimate yet universal. Like a heart beat, like breaths, like rain, like movement of the body. Listen throughout space, throughout time...it is full of beat of being human.
